document.full_text: california governor jerry brown will slightly moderate his call for tax hikes in light of an unexpected rise in revenues, the los angeles times said on saturday as brown prepared a revised budget plan.
document.title: california governor to moderate tax plan: report
lines_and_colors: california governor jerry brown will slightly moderate his call for tax hikes in light of an unexpected rise in revenues, the los angeles times said on saturday as brown prepared a revised budget plan.
